text: "Say You Will" is a 1987 song by British American band Foreigner. It is the leading single from their sixth studio album Inside Information. It went to number 4 in Norway, number 6 in the United States, number 14 in the Netherlands, number 20 in Switzerland, number 22 in Germany and number 71 in the United Kingdom. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:1987 songs Category:Rock songs Category:Foreigner (band) songs
title: Say You Will (Foreigner song)
